order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sybida_job (job_id, job_student_id, job_firm, job_contact, job_weal, job_end_time, job_study_id, job_picture, job_alter_time, job_null1, job_null2) values (#{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobStudentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobFirm,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{jobContact,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{jobWeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jobStudyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobAlterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jobNull1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobNull2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sybida_job
job_id = #{record.jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_student_id = #{record.jobStudentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_firm = #{record.jobFirm,jdbcType=CHAR},

job_null1 = #{record.jobNull1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_null2 = #{record.jobNull2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sybida_job set job_id = #{record.jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_student_id = #{record.jobStudentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_firm = #{record.jobFirm,jdbcType=CHAR}, job_contact = #{record.jobContact,jdbcType=CHAR}, job_weal = #{record.jobWeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_end_time = #{record.jobEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, job_study_id = #{record.jobStudyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_picture = #{record.jobPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_alter_time = #{record.jobAlterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, job_null1 = #{record.jobNull1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_null2 = #{record.jobNull2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sybida_job
job_student_id = #{jobStudentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_firm = #{jobFirm,jdbcType=CHAR},
job_contact = #{jobContact,jdbcType=CHAR},
job_weal = #{jobWeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_end_time = #{jobEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
job_study_id = #{jobStudyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_picture = #{jobPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_alter_time = #{jobAlterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
job_null1 = #{jobNull1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_null2 = #{jobNull2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sybida_job set job_student_id = #{jobStudentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_firm = #{jobFirm,jdbcType=CHAR}, job_contact = #{jobContact,jdbcType=CHAR}, job_weal = #{jobWeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_end_time = #{jobEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, job_study_id = #{jobStudyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_picture = #{jobPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_alter_time = #{jobAlterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, job_null1 = #{jobNull1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_null2 = #{jobNull2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sj.*,st.student_name,st.student_city,sy.study_aspect from sybida_job sj ,sybida_student st , sybida_study sy where sj.job_study_id = sy.study_id and sj.job_student_id = st.student_id

select sj.*,st.student_name,st.student_city,sy.study_aspect from sybida_job sj ,sybida_student st , sybida_study sy where sj.job_study_id = sy.study_id and sj.job_student_id = st.student_id and sj.job_student_id = #{stuID}
select student_name, job_weal from sybida_student, sybida_job where job_student_id = student_id

select sj.*,sst.student_name,sst.student_sex,sc.class_num from sybida_job sj inner join sybida_student sst on sj.job_student_id=sst.student_id inner join sybida_class sc on sst.student_class_id=sc.class_id where sj.job_student_id = #{jobStudentId}
